metadata.title: CVE-2023-40550 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in Shim when it tried to validate theSBAT information. This issue may expose sensitive data during the system'sboot phase.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40550` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

shim-signed - 1.58+15.8-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

shim - 15.8-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shim-signed package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.58').
shim package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '15.8-0ubuntu1').
